ygData.subject: [The EverQuest Tavern] Re: How do you get married on evequest?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... the Gm ... You don t necessarily need a GM if the female character does not have a surname yet (pre-20 or by choice). However, you will if changes need to
ygData.messageBody:
--- In theeverquesttavern@y..., "erik" <naslund@a...> wrote:
> > From: "tundrawyrm" <no_reply@y...>
> >
> > But make sure a few times that the GM will be there. They
> > dont keep records of this stuff so petition and make sure that
the Gm
> > you are talking to can personally do the service.
>

You don't necessarily need a GM if the female character does not have
a surname yet (pre-20 or by choice). However, you will if changes
need to be made.

After that it's entirely up to the player how their wedding unfolds.
I did mine eons ago when I was around level 13 I believe. It was a
personal wedding, bride, myself, closest friends and a GM (who was
also a good friend) at Qeynos (we were fighting around their for XP
at the time). Two years later we renewed our vows at a neutral zone,
Lake Rathe with the entire guild and drunk members proceeded to
destroy each other at the Arena afterwards for sh**s and giggles :)
